Class ByteInputStream.SectionInputStream<E extends Exception>

java.lang.Object
io.github.eutro.jwasm.ByteInputStream.SectionInputStream<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The exception that may be thrown by gets.

Enclosing interface:
ByteInputStream<E extends Exception>
public static class ByteInputStream.SectionInputStream<E extends Exception> extends Object implements ByteInputStream<E>
A section of a stream, as returned by ByteInputStream.sectionStream(int).

  • Method Details

    • get

      public int get() throws E
      Get a single unsigned byte from the stream.
      Specified by:
      get in interface ByteInputStream<E extends Exception>
      Returns:
      An unsigned byte b (0x00 &lt;= b &lt;= 0xFF), or -1 if the end of the stream has been reached.
      Throws:
      E - If a read error occured.

    • get

      public int get(byte[] buf, int offset, int len) throws E
      Get bytes in bulk from the stream.

      Defaults to repeatedly getting bytes with ByteInputStream.get().

      Specified by:
      get in interface ByteInputStream<E extends Exception>
      Parameters:
      buf - The byte array to copy to.
      offset - The offset in buf to start writing at.
      len - The length of bytes to copy at most.
      Returns:
      The number of bytes gotten, or -1 if the end of stream had been reached.
      Throws:
      E - If a read error occured.

    • skip

      public int skip(int count) throws E
      Skip a number of bytes from the stream, terminating early if the end of the stream is reached.

      Defaults to repeatedly getting bytes with ByteInputStream.get().

      Specified by:
      skip in interface ByteInputStream<E extends Exception>
      Parameters:
      count - The number of bytes to skip.
      Returns:
      How many bytes were skipped.
      Throws:
      E - If a read error occured.

    • skipAll

      public void skipAll() throws E
      Skip all the remaining bytes in the stream.

      Defaults to calling ByteInputStream.skip(int) with Integer.MAX_VALUE.

      Specified by:
      skipAll in interface ByteInputStream<E extends Exception>
      Throws:
      E - If a read error occured.
